name: Mopidy
desc: An extensible music server that plays music from local disk, Spotify, SoundCloud, and more

options.name: configuration
options.desc: The configuration that Mopidy should use.

options.name: dataDir
options.desc: The directory where Mopidy stores its state.

options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Mopidy, a music player daemon.

options.name: extensionPackages
options.desc: Mopidy extensions that should be loaded by the service.

options.name: extraConfigFiles
options.desc: Extra config file read by Mopidy when the service starts. Later filesin the list overrides earlier configuration.
